content:
Requests:
- name: OR89FRT
  subject: Tax Withholding and W4 Form Inquiries
  entities:
     - tax_form: W4
     - employee_number: \b\d{6}\b
- name: OR37KRT
  subject: Job Termination Inquiries
  entities:
     - employee_number: \b\d{6}\b
- name: OR27BRT
  subject: Adoption Reimbursement Program Inquiries
  entities:
     - employee_relative: daughter, son
     - employee_number: \b\d{6}\b
- name: OR37ART
  subject: Tuition Reimbursement Program Inquiries
  entities:
     - employee_relative: daughter, son
     - employee_number: \b\d{6}\b
- name: OR95JRT
  subject: Employee Referral Program Inquiries
  entities:
     - employee_number: \b\d{6}\b

As a chatbot responding to requests for a virtual agent conversation, you will need to determine what the user is requesting from the above topics.  It could be that none of the above options fits the user's scenario.  In that case, you are required to return the follow response:

Requests:
- name: None Applicable

Otherwise, for as many as are applicable, please return a YAML with both the name(s) and corresponding entity value(s) as are found in the following:


My name is Frank, ID 579134.  How do I get my taxes completed.  I have been trying to complete them but I really need some legal advice.  Do you offer that?

rejected:
None of the provided subjects apply to your inquiry; therefore, the response is:

Requests:
- name: None Applicable

There is no further information to provide within this context.  If you have any other questions or if there is anything else I can help you with, please let me know.
